DataSource.Query: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY gift_cards.gift_card_number) sn, gift_cards.gift_card_number, gift_cards.first_name +' '+ gift_cards.middle_name +' '+ gift_cards.last_name AS customer_name, SUM(transactions.credit) - SUM(transactions.debit) AS balance FROM sales.gift_cards LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gift_card_id, value_date, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN amount ELSE 0 END AS debit, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN amount ELSE 0 END AS credit FROM sales.gift_card_transactions WHERE transaction_master_id NOT IN ( SELECT transaction_master_id FROM finance.transaction_master WHERE verification_status_id <= 0 ) ) transactions ON gift_cards.gift_card_id = transactions.gift_card_id GROUP BY gift_cards.gift_card_number, gift_cards.first_name, gift_cards.middle_name, gift_cards.last_name;
